name: Astro Impact! DM
description:
a simple demake of my upcoming game called Astro Impact made for the Nokia 3310 game jam

Its a simple game. if you run out of lives, just close and start the game. You'll encounter 5 kinds of enemies

The game has no sounds; its a vacuum in space! (definitely not because of time constraints)

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS: for the Movement (Up, Down, Left, Right and also Diagonals)

NUMPAD 5: Shooting (Can be held down or rapidly pressed)

Requirements

Dual Core or better CPU 

Integrated Graphics (intel HD 2000 Or better)

2 GB Ram

Windows 10 

If you can run windows 10, you will definitely run this game.

Resolution of the game is set to 672x384 by default but it can be resized to any aspec ratio or resolution by dragging the edges of the window of the game. 

NOTICE:

The game is unplayable because I forgot to add the pck file alongside the executable

If you wish to download the files, go to this link

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1RDuWNlRywW5_mhO7x-fwy85Em2LvNdh1?usp=share_link

Download, copy and paste all of them to the game's folder, overwrite everything

Sorry for the inconvenience
